name: Keelboat (Unearthed Arcana)
speed: 3 miles per hour (72 miles per day)
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Control:
text: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the Keelboat (Unearthed Arcana) can't turn.

trait.name: Movement:
text: Hit Points: 100; -5 ft. speed per 20 damage taken
Locomotion (water): sails, speed 25 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 35 ft. while sailing with the wind.

trait.name: Movement:
text: Hit Points: 100; -5 ft. speed per 25 damage taken

action.name: Weapons:
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 16 (3d10) piercing damage. Keelboat (Unearthed Arcana)s typically include a ballista only when they are equipped for combat.

description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 3
